Pre-Game Insights: Rovman Powell will lead West Indies in the South Africa T20I series.
Roston Chase will be his deputy.
The series will be played at Brian Lara Stadium, Tarouba, Trinidad on August 23, 24 and 27 respectively.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Andre Russell has been rested for the series due to workload management.
Jason Holder has also rested for the South Africa T20I series on account of workload management.
The series will be a best opportunity for West Indies to "reset and refocus with their game plan".
Others: West Indies head coach Daren Sammy expressed his confidence in the squad they selected for the South Africa T20I series.
